actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to prohibit the Committee on Rules from reporting any rule or order waiving any section 303 point of order contained in the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to general appropriation bills.

summary.text: Amends the Rules of the House of Representatives to prohibit any waiver of the Congressional Budget Act which allows the consideration of general appropriations bills without the adoption of the first concurrent resolution on the budget.

titles.title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to prohibit the Committee on Rules from reporting any rule or order waiving any section 303 point of order contained in the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to general appropriation bills.
